text: The 2013 Wimbledon Championships are described below in detail, in the form of day-by-day summaries. ==Day-by-day summaries== ===Day 1 (24 June)=== * Seeds out: ** Gentlemen's Singles: Rafael Nadal [5], Stan Wawrinka [11], Janko Tipsarević [14], Fabio Fognini [30] ** Ladies' Singles: Sara Errani [5], Varvara Lepchenko [26] * Schedule {| class="wikitable collapsible uncollapsed" style="margin:auto;" !
